Like all #medicines, #COVID19vaccines can cause #SideEffects. 

The majority are mild and many people will not experience any at all. 

Serious side effects are very rare and must be balanced against the prevention of severe #COVID19. 

#EMAPublicMeeting4
This is the largest #vaccination campaign ever with over 550 million doses administered in the EU/EEA and the safety profile of the #COVID19vaccines is very reassuring #EMAPublicMeeting4

We encourage everybody who is offered a flu vaccine to get the shot and protect themselves and their family, friends and colleagues. Data show that #flu vaccines can be co-administered with #COVID19vaccines. #EMAPresser

#COVID19treatment developed by #Pfizer: EMA‚Äôs Executive Director has asked our human medicines committee to give advice on its emergency use to EU countries before a marketing authorisation. The procedure will start tomorrow. #EMAPresser
EMA's evaluation of #COVID19treatment Xevudy (sotrovimab): an outcome is expected within 2‚É£ months, depending on whether the data submitted are sufficiently robust. #EMAPresser #COVID19

#COVID19treatment Ronapreve: Study shows that it reduces the chance of becoming sick with #COVID19 in people who are in close contact with a household member infected with the virus. This can help people who might not respond well to vaccination. #EMAPresser
#Comirnaty for 5-11-year olds: EMA evaluation is ongoing. An outcome is possible by the end of next week. #COVID19 #EMAPresser

Academic studies support mix and match #booster strategies. These studies are also looking into intervals shorter than 6‚É£ months. We expect to reach a conclusion on this by end of November. #EMAPresser

#Boosters will play an important part in vaccination strategies. 
Data is showing that #boosterdoses restore protection against the #COVID19 infection and disease in times of #deltavariant dominance. #EMAPresser

Marketing authorisation holders for the other #COVID19vaccines approved in the üá™üá∫ have also submitted their annual renewal application. These assessments are currently ongoing. #EMAPresser

Some EU countries have already started administering booster doses. ‚ÄºÔ∏è Implementation of #COVID19 vaccination campaigns in the üá™üá∫ remains the prerogative of the public health authorities guiding the vaccination campaigns in each Member State. #EMAPresser

What we know for now: When administered in 2 doses, #COVID19vaccines protect against hospitalisation and death from #COVID19. We monitor this very carefully together with @ECDC_EU, so that we can spot trends and update guidance. #EMAPresser

EMA is also currently evaluating an application for the use of a #boosterdose of #Spikevax to be given at least 6 months after the 2nd dose in people aged 12 years and older. EMA will communicate the outcome of the assessment. #EMAPresser

#Myocarditis is the main safety concern emerging with mRNA vaccines, especially after the 2nd dose. 
‚ÄºÔ∏è Most of the myocarditis cases reported are mild and self-limiting. 
We cannot yet characterise this risk after a 3rd dose because it occurs so rarely. #EMAPresser

EMA conclusion: #Comirnaty #boosterdose is safe & effective, as data show a rise in antibody levels when giving a booster approx. 6 months after the 2nd dose in people aged 18 to 55. 
Currently we cannot firmly recommend when & for whom to implement booster doses. #EMAPresser
‚ÄºÔ∏è It is important to distinguish between 3rd doses for people with severely weakened immune systems and #boosterdoses for the general population. #EMAPresser

Based on limited data available, the use of a 3rd dose is restricted to severely immunocompromised patients. There is no clear evidence that less immunocompromised patients would benefit from a 3d dose as part of the primary vaccination series. #EMAPresser
The EMA conclusion for both vaccines is based on studies in patients with severely weakened immune systems because of use of immunosuppressive drugs after an organ transplant. #EMAPresser
EMA concluded that 3rd doses of #Comirnaty and #Spikevax may be given to people with severely weakened immune systems aged 12 or older, at least 28 days after their second dose. #EMAPresser

tweets.text:

- our infographic below

Updated üö¶ maps are online!

Color-blind friendly map in next tweet.
https://t.co/CcBVx6B0o5 https://t.co/K2oaO7oqzq

EMA‚Äôs remit is the evaluation of vaccines & medicines in view of their use in the EU. EMA has no responsibility regarding #COVID19 vaccinations accepted in the EU for travel purposes. https://t.co/G9pLB4jrLW #ReopenEU #EMAPresser
EMA is currently evaluating an application to extend the use of Spikevax to include young people aged 12 to 17. We expect to reach a conclusion at the end of next week. #EMAPresser

Four monoclonal antibodies or antibody combinations are under #RollingReview. The rolling review will continue until there is sufficient evidence for a formal marketing authorisation application. #EMAPresser

We also need effective #COVID19 treatments to save the lives of those becoming ill through the infection and to bring the pandemic under control. EMA is currently evaluating use of Olumiant in hospitalised COVID-19 patients requiring supplemental oxygen. #EMAPresser

EMA and üá™üá∫ Member States continuously monitor these reports to detect any new safety issues. We are committed to ensuring that any new suspected #SideEffects are rapidly investigated, and decisions are based on science. #EMAPresser

üì¢ The fact that someone has had a medical issue or died after vaccination does not necessarily mean that the death was caused by the vaccine. 
Other reasons, for example underlying or emerging health problems not related to the vaccination, may have played a role. #EMAPresser
We updated our monthly safety reports for all authorised #COVID19vaccines. These reports describe suspected #SideEffects observed after the use of a COVID-19 vaccine. #EMAPresser

Healthcare professionals and people getting vaccinated with Comirnaty & Spikevax should be aware of symptoms of myocarditis & pericarditis. Available data suggest that these symptoms are usually mild and improve with rest or treatment. #EMAPresser

EMA concluded that there is a small risk of myocarditis & pericarditis following vaccination with Comirnaty and Spikevax. The product information will be updated to include myocarditis and pericarditis as very rare side effects of these vaccines. #EMAPresser

Preliminary data suggest a full vaccination course of #COVID19vaccines, including #Comirnaty, Spikevax (previously COVID-19 vaccine #Moderna) or #Vaxzevria are needed to provide adequate protection against the #DeltaVariant. #VaccinesWork #EMAPresser

The four #COVIDvaccines authorised in the üá™üá∫ provide a high protection against all the strains that are circulating, especially against severe disease and hospitalisation. #VaccinesWork #EMAPresser

It is too early to confirm if and when a booster dose will be needed. There is not yet enough data from vaccination campaigns & ongoing studies to understand how long protection from #COVID19vaccines will last. EMA will review data quickly once they become available. #EMAPresser

EMA is continuously monitoring the virus mutations and their impact on the way #COVID19vaccines work. Given the rapid spread of the #DeltaVariant, it is extremely important to vaccinate as many people in Europe as possible according to national recommendations. #EMAPresser

Watch live üî¥

Don‚Äôt miss our tweets during the press briefing. Follow #EMAPresser. https://t.co/V0BUmOwQ4T
